title: Velva the Warrior
description: Velva rides her horse, Fallopius, and guides her boat, The Cervix, to protect Majora from the evil Testiclese.
quote: Your orbs of ecstasy are mine, all mine.
altHero: Velva, warrior woman, riding a horse and holding a bird of prey
alt1: a busty woman chained to a tree as the evil Testiclese leers at her
alt3: Velva and team with models of her ship and castle
alt4: Velva standing over the evil Testiclese
